website_summaries.verdict: High-cut briefs that feel as good as they look. Many fans agree that they are off the charts in terms of comfort.
pros: Made of microfiber fabric that's soft, comfortable, and cooling
Seamless construction and flat waistband make them undetectable under clothing
Briefs hold their shape even with frequent washings
cons: Sizes run just a little small for some wearers
A few customers wish the material was a bit thicker

customer_reviews.title: Hard to find hi-cut leg undies these days....
customer_reviews.text: I used to buy all of my underwear at Victoria's Secret as they had a great line of cotton, hi-cut undies that fit right under the bellybutton but weren't bikinis. Then they stopped making them so I found these as an alternative. Although they're not cotton, they are comfortable and look great. Just enough coverage to feel comfy with just enough leg to feel sexy!
customer_reviews.author: Ruby Tuesday

customer_reviews.title: Soft and Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: A cool and comfortable panty. Great everyday panty, but great for wearing while working out too. They are breathable and are quick drying. Not too tight in the waist and no rolling of the waistband. They stay in place and keep the bottom covered. Washes well and holding their color. They come out of the washer almost dry so I just hang them up to finish drying. Great panty offered in a variety of colors and sizes.
customer_reviews.author: the anonymous one

customer_reviews.title: Accept no substitutes
customer_reviews.text: These Bali are my go-to underwear. They are smoothing, seamless, and feel great! They work well under a variety of materials. I no longer look elsewhere, unless under duress. May seem a bit pricey for a few pair, but I guarantee you will want to stock up when you see how they feel, and how they perform under thinner material.
customer_reviews.author: Eve M. McGivern

customer_reviews.title: So soft and comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Exceeded my expectations. Very soft, easy-stretch fabric, not binding or tight. Very comfortable to wear, and only a little pantyline shows with tight pants. Wish they came in thigh-length so no pantylines would show. Only problem is, I wear panty-shields daily for freshness, and they don't stick very well, as there is no cotton lining in the crotch.
customer_reviews.author: RtzAZ

customer_reviews.title: These are great. Thinner than I expected
customer_reviews.text: These are great. Thinner than I expected. Don't look for any tummy control but they are very comfortable and fit up over my navel. I'm 5'2" and 150lbs...the 7/Larges are a perfect fit.
customer_reviews.author: Brian J. Lawing

customer_reviews.title: I bought these and they are soft and comfortable much better most nylon panties
customer_reviews.text: I bought these and they are soft and comfortable much better most nylon panties. The name says Microfiber but they are 100% nylon with a microfiber feel.
customer_reviews.author: Grace G.

customer_reviews.title: Great fit. Cool and Comfy. Priced right.
customer_reviews.text: I love these cool, lite-weight hi-rise, hi-cut panties. They fit like skin, no ride up in the crevice or rolling down at the top band. Hard to find and these were priced very well. Will go back for more.
customer_reviews.author: Diane M.

customer_reviews.title: Finally, my long search for a decent panty is ended.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a panty to replace a style that Lane Bryant had discontinued. So many others had elastic at the edges and the leg openings were never cut high enough in the front. These panties fit like a dream and are so comfortable. No bunching! The high waist is comfortable and does not roll down. And - bonus! The reinforced crotch area actually extends forward enough in the front to actually do some good! Finally, someone got it right!
customer_reviews.author: JennySue

customer_reviews.title: Extreme comfort and great fit
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I've ordered these panties. The fabric is so soft, and the seamless waistband makes them comfortable all day long. The price for the 6 pack is also very good. I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: NWGal

customer_reviews.title: Best of all I've tried
customer_reviews.text: These are high waisted (great!), hi-legged (without being skimpy), soft on the skin, and they machine wash and dry well for a VERY LONG time. They are, by far, the best undies I've ever tried!
customer_reviews.author: Irene Rose

customer_reviews.title: Quality not as good as previous
customer_reviews.text: I have worn this underwear for many years but was disappointed with the change in fit and fabric. Material is thinner, cut skimpier and elastic cheaper. The overall quality is less. Please bring back previous styling and material.
customer_reviews.author: Marsha B.

customer_reviews.title: Set of only 1. Did not send 6
customer_reviews.text: Was supposed to be a set of 5. Was only onr pair. Contacted seller and ordered again, only sent one pair again. Fits as expected and comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Fits good, but crotch is not white cotton like I wanted
customer_reviews.text: I have bought these before from Bali and they had a white cotton crotch - especially when your using a pad - these don't and when you put a pad on, it doesn't adhere to the panties. I can deal with it, but not sure I'd order them again.
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn Kirbach

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I love this underwear. The fabric is comfortable and breathable, but fits in a comfortably snug way that I can't really find in packaged underwear. The cut is excellent and doesn't move around on my body very much. And this 6 pack is a great deal. I'm very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome! I got them to wear under dresses and skirts, they work perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Close but not quite
customer_reviews.text: I like the feel of the fabric and the seat coverage is pretty good on most of them, but they vary considerably and I've ended up giving up on them because the waistband is uncomfortably tight, though a size larger would be baggy.
customer_reviews.author: Meredith McMinn

customer_reviews.title: Good quality but runs small
customer_reviews.text: Quality is good. Size runs small. Fortunately the waistband is soft and doesn't bind. They're a good quality for the money; just order a size up.
customer_reviews.author: LegacyGirl

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Its hard to find a six pack of nude colored undies . I needed them to wear under white capris and white slacks. Great quality. Fit as expected. Wash up great in cold water and line dryed.
customer_reviews.author: Mary B. Helsel

customer_reviews.title: comfort fit great
customer_reviews.text: Soft knit with easy give is great. Only wish there were a cotton crotch inset. Then they would be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: L.D. Hobbs

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying and wearing these for about 5 years now. I love them. They don't bind, don't ride up, and the elastic is barely discernible under pants. Love, love love
customer_reviews.author: Irene Rose

customer_reviews.title: disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I reliably wear a size 7 hi - cut panty. The elastic around the top is too snug for my shape so forms a little muffin top. (I'm 5'4" 135 lbs.)
customer_reviews.author: foreigncrimereader

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a gift for a family member and she was only compliments to this. Strechy and comfortable it was a great value for the money! Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Debora B

customer_reviews.title: Not greatest quality
customer_reviews.text: This underwear are comfortable but the seam around the waistband unraveled rather quickly, thus making the underwear unwearable.
customer_reviews.author: ChickenMama

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: These underwear are very comfortable and great material. Wear very well, wash well - no shrinkage. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Et

customer_reviews.title: Not quite as pictured.
customer_reviews.text: The stripes were not white as shown in the picture. Seller was quick to respond and a refund was promptly granted. Great customer service.
customer_reviews.author: C. G.

customer_reviews.title: Fit is small.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a size larger than what i usually wear because my size not available. Even this larger size fit tight.
customer_reviews.author: Taisan03

customer_reviews.title: Thinking of buying more
customer_reviews.text: My favorite underwear. Perfect fit. Wash well. Long lasting. No panty lines.
customer_reviews.author: chica

customer_reviews.title: Excellent products
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased Bali underware over 40 years. I trust Bali products.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good everyday panty
customer_reviews.text: Dislike no cotton lining Like fit and feel Good price Average eye appeal
customer_reviews.author: remove

customer_reviews.title: Love these panties
customer_reviews.text: Been wearing them for a year. They were well, keep their shape, don’t absorb odor, don’t ride up. Will order again.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: If you have a picky teenager, you will not be disappointed with these.
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my teenage daughter that is so far beyond PICKY that it’s ridiculous! I’ve donated SO many brand new undies. Errgh! She WEARS these and without complaint. Need I say more....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: RUNS SMALL !!!!
customer_reviews.text: Fabric quality is fair, at best. Sizing runs SMALL !!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Chrissy of Mo'chanicsville

customer_reviews.title: You can always trust Bali for a good product
customer_reviews.text: Nice fit, flesh colored, great price. i didn't like the seam when l first opened the package but it doesn't show and stays in place.
customer_reviews.author: BJ H.

customer_reviews.title: I love them. Have worn them for years
customer_reviews.text: I love them. Have worn them for years. They fit like a gloves, no yanken them out of private parts and no binding. Super comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just love them!
customer_reviews.text: Always come back to these, great price and great fit. Hit me just below the naval which I love and a bit higher on the thigh.
customer_reviews.author: virtueofpatience

customer_reviews.title: Fabric feels like nylon. Not a snug fit. Not like the picture.
customer_reviews.text: The fabric was not what I expected based on previous orders of microfiber panties. These felt like they were made of nylon. The fit was too high and too baggy. I returned them and got a refund from the vendor.
customer_reviews.author: QueenB

customer_reviews.title: Fit and feeling good.
customer_reviews.text: Fit and feel very good, better then replacing same item.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret L Oneill

customer_reviews.title: Great Fit
customer_reviews.text: I have worn these panties for years and love the fit.
customer_reviews.author: DCR

customer_reviews.title: I have been wearing panties like this for years
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing panties like this for years. Good fit, do not ride up (which is the most important thing).
customer_reviews.author: C P Farr

customer_reviews.title: Not no show.
customer_reviews.text: These are NOT noline panties. Was looking for something to wear with my workout tights. These show panty lines!
customer_reviews.author: AMOM

customer_reviews.title: No cotton liner
customer_reviews.text: The panties fit fine, but I was shocked to find they did not have a cotton crotch liner! Makes them hot!
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Soft, flexible, breatheable AND you get 6! The best price I was able to find for the quantity.Wish there was a multi-color pack!
customer_reviews.text: Love only having a seam in the back of the crotch and none in the front! Also love the really small trim around the legs that doesn't irritate. The material is super soft and has some stretch in it.
customer_reviews.author: Shutterbug

customer_reviews.title: Fit is great.
customer_reviews.text: I always look for Bali panties. They fit well and are comfortable. They're bright and wash nicely, though I personally never put them in the dryer.
customer_reviews.author: Lucky's mom

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd purchase. They are soft, fit great, don't ride up, full coverage. Fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: TheCollarGals

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable I could have worn a size smaller for a better fit.
customer_reviews.author: sly

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and I don't think there are any panty lines
customer_reviews.text: Fits as expected-- since I have worn these before. Comfortable and I don't think there are any panty lines!!
customer_reviews.author: sarareed

customer_reviews.title: Cool in summer
customer_reviews.text: Liked everything, cool in summer, nice waist band with no advertising.
customer_reviews.author: claire c.

customer_reviews.title: At Last!
customer_reviews.text: The best panty ever. Love the microfiber, no riding up anywhere. You forget you have them on.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bad material this time
customer_reviews.text: Bali is a very nice brand, but the product has so bad material this time.
customer_reviews.author: CECIBEL DEL CARMEN VASQUEZ TORAL

customer_reviews.title: Love the fit and the color
customer_reviews.text: Love the fit and the color. They are just like the ones that I buy in the store but the bundle made it more affordable to purchase them.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Tawney

customer_reviews.title: Sucks
customer_reviews.text: Sorriest Bali undies I ever bought. Always top quality before. Thin thin material. Sorry elastic. Will never buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Pruitt

customer_reviews.title: I like them very much. They fit well and are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I like them very much. They fit well and are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: karen g. dicicco

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: Bali is a great brand sa and I like the way bv these fit.
customer_reviews.author: Verlona Tate

customer_reviews.title: Recommended highly
customer_reviews.text: These are the best fitting underwear I have ever worn. I recommend them highly.
customer_reviews.author: Luckey David

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value and fit
customer_reviews.text: Great value and looks great under all clothing cause no lines. Comfy too
customer_reviews.author: Debra H

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are the most comfortable panties. Smooth, soft breathable. Don't ride , bunch of show lines.
customer_reviews.author: Big Hair

customer_reviews.title: Nice, fit well.
customer_reviews.text: Nice. Comfy. They do fade a bit in the wash.
customer_reviews.author: Lah

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent sizing among colors
customer_reviews.text: I have this same product in white and the black in the same size is literally a size smaller.
customer_reviews.author: Elderberry

customer_reviews.title: Quality..!
customer_reviews.text: After washing first time I was not able to wear because of shrinkage !
customer_reviews.author: Gwen Ramer

customer_reviews.title: The comfort and fit
customer_reviews.text: Best comfort, holds up wash after wash, very smooth material and Ilike the high cut leg but still covers tummy nicely. I've ordered the set twice!
customer_reviews.author: Louanne W.

customer_reviews.title: A bargain at the price.
customer_reviews.text: I do love these panties. They are soft and comfy, the waistband and legs don't bind or ride up or down, they just plain stay where they're supposed to be! Long- lasting too.
customer_reviews.author: Jen Rabalais

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this particular pantie. So comfortable and Never wear out!
customer_reviews.author: Boogie47

customer_reviews.title: Nice feel and fit.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice feel and fit. Not sure yet about durability.
customer_reviews.author: NIfty Betty

customer_reviews.title: Buy a bigger size than what you normally wear.
customer_reviews.text: They fit when they were new. But after they were washed and dried they shrunk.
customer_reviews.author: M. Crayne

customer_reviews.title: Great Fit
customer_reviews.text: I am glad they are still making these! They are my favorite and only.
customer_reviews.author: KK

customer_reviews.title: Bali Panties
customer_reviews.text: Tight in the waist, but roomy in the bottom. I kinda like my panties to fit my waist and bottom the same.
customer_reviews.author: JRM

customer_reviews.title: Size too small
customer_reviews.text: The product 8/9 was more size 6/7. They would have been fine otherwise. Unfortunately, I assumed they would fit, and washed them all, therefore keeping me from being able to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Lydia Brown

customer_reviews.title: Total comfort
customer_reviews.text: They look too small, but they're very stretchy and completely comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce

customer_reviews.title: Fit
customer_reviews.text: I love the feel of the material and no seams in back.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Carter

customer_reviews.title: Superior fit, comfort, and durability!
customer_reviews.text: Have always loved Bali microfiber panties...these were too large for me: but perfect for my daughter. She's very satisfied with the product....I prefer style #2361!
customer_reviews.author: Bebe

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the panties; they are really comfortable and don't ride up.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Achen

customer_reviews.title: Best Ever Panties
customer_reviews.text: I just love these panties, I have been wearing them for over 20 years.
customer_reviews.author: Lucie Johnson

customer_reviews.title: These are awesome panties.  Very Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I have worn these for years. They are so comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Jean Zimmerman

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this!
customer_reviews.text: I would give these a zero if that was an option. I can’t understand how anyone would like these super small cheap pieces of junk.
customer_reviews.author: wendy

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit! Very pleased ! Very comfortable and no ride up. Will be ordering more
customer_reviews.author: Julie Kelemen

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Best panties on the market! So comfy you forget you're wearing them. And they last for years. This is the only brand I'm buying from now on!
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Westbrook

customer_reviews.title: Bali panties  review
customer_reviews.text: I have always loved Bali panties. These are the best ones by far. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Love them! Super fast shipper. I will order again. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Martinell

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product. Have worn for years. Good fit and the high cut leg flatters
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Kazanjian

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: received briefs vs. hi cut. not a briefs kinda gal but kept them anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fit well
customer_reviews.text: Great pair of undies! They fit well and feel great!
customer_reviews.author: Imagine That

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: At this time nothing bad to say, iJust bought these underware
customer_reviews.author: john joe mata

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: hated hated hated. Not at all what I expected. The material is extremely thin. They are HUGE.
customer_reviews.author: A Busy Reader

product_meta.title: Bali Women's Comfort Revolution Seamless High-Cut Brief Panty (6 Pack)
product_meta.description: Your favorite Barely There panties are now Bali Comfort Revolution panties. Same great panty. Just a new name! Panty is so silky-smooth you'll hardly know it's there. Sensuous microfiber as soft as a light caress. Hi-cut design flatters your legs. Comfortable coverage in back that resists ride-up.
feature_bullets: Sensuous microfiber as soft as a light caress.
Comfortable coverage in back that resists ride-up.
